actions.description: The velociraptor makes one Bite attack and one Claw attack.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.
actions.name: Bite

actions.description: 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) slashing damage.
actions.name: Claw

specialTraits.description: The velociraptor has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the velociraptor's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.
specialTraits.name: Pack Tactics
